comments.body: I think we should mention that minor/patch versions are filled in as 0 if they're not found. This is different from the behavior of other methods in this class (e.g. majorMinor will give an error if minor is not present)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +69,73 @@   * Extracts the major, minor and patch parts from the input `version`. Note that if minor or patch
   * version is missing from the input, this will return 0 for these parts. Returns `None` if the
   * input is not of a valid format.
   *
   * Examples of valid version:
